[[inst_hl_lhp]]
==== HL.LHP

*Syntax:* hl.lhp [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lhp.svg[HL.LHP encoding,width=800]
